sql_list.sql_query:
CREATE VIEW coretest.employee_core_view AS
SELECT 
    employee_id, 
    full_name,
    email, 
    phone_number, 
    hire_date, 
    project_id,
    QUARTER(hire_date) AS hire_quarter
FROM 
    coretest.employee_core;

SELECT 
    employee_id, 
    full_name, 
    email, 
    phone_number, 
    hire_date, 
    project_id, 
    hire_quarter
FROM 
    coretest.employee_core_view
ORDER BY 
    hire_quarter;

SELECT 
    employee_id, 
    full_name, 
    email, 
    phone_number, 
    hire_date, 
    project_id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN QUARTER(hire_date) = 1 THEN 'Q1'
        WHEN QUARTER(hire_date) = 2 THEN 'Q2'
        WHEN QUARTER(hire_date) = 3 THEN 'Q3'
        WHEN QUARTER(hire_date) = 4 THEN 'Q4'
    END AS hire_quarter
FROM 
    coretest.employee_core_view
ORDER BY 
    hire_quarter;
